title: Predictive factors of basic palliative and hospice care among patients with cancer visiting the emergency department in a Hungarian tertiary care center
content:
Publication date: 30 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 8

Author(s): Csaba Varga, Zsolt Springó, Márton Koch, Lilla Prenek, Lili Porcsa, Szabolcs Bellyei, László Rumi, Éva Szabó, Zoltan Ungvari, Kyra Girán, István Kiss, Éva Pozsgai
